BlockState.description: Block that the falling block represents

Properties.description: Name value pairs of block states and values

Time.description: Time until the block disapears. Disapears if it reaches 0 or 600

DropItem.description: Should the block drop as an item if the block cannot be placed

FallHurtMax.description: Maximum amount of damage the block can do

FallHurtAmount.description: How much damage the block should do initially
